entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
